description: This file defines the interface IGuide within the WPEFramework::Exchange namespace. The IGuide interface provides methods for interacting with a program guide, such as retrieving channel and program information, controlling parental settings, and managing notifications related to guide events.

classes.name: IGuide
classes.description: An interface providing access to guide functionalities such as retrieving program and channel information, parental controls, and notification management.

classes.name: IGuide::INotification
classes.description: An interface for receiving notifications related to guide events like EIT broadcast, emergency alerts, and parental control changes.

methods.name: StartParser
methods.description: Starts the guide parser with a specific plugin shell.

methods.name: GetChannels
methods.description: Retrieves the list of available channels.

methods.name: GetPrograms
methods.description: Retrieves the list of current programs.

methods.name: GetCurrentProgram
methods.description: Retrieves information about the current program for a specified channel.

methods.name: GetAudioLanguages
methods.description: Retrieves available audio languages for a specified program.

methods.name: GetSubtitleLanguages
methods.description: Retrieves available subtitle languages for a specified program.

methods.name: IsParentalControlled
methods.description: Checks if parental control is enabled.

methods.name: SetParentalLock
methods.description: Locks or unlocks parental control for a specific item.

methods.name: IsParentalLocked
methods.description: Checks if a specific item is parental locked.

ctags.name: IGuide
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IGuide : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
